snippet: Jacoby Ellsbury hit a game-winning single in the bottom of the ninth inning to lift the struggling Boston Red Sox over the Yankees in front of a sold-out crowd at Fenway Park.
abstract: Boston Red Sox, last place in the American League East, surprise the New York Yankees with a 4-3 win.
lead_paragraph: Jacoby Ellsbury hit a game-winning single in the bottom of the ninth inning to lift the struggling Boston Red Sox over the Yankees in front of a sold-out crowd at Fenway Park.

headline.seo: Last-Place Red Sox Savor Beating Yankees
headline.main: Yankees Slide Back in Loss to Red Sox
headline.print_headline: Yankees Slide Back in Loss to Red Sox
